about_the_game:
Revertices is a 2D sidescrolling action game where you must choose a lone survivor! However, the chosen must fight the corrupted remains of their two beloved friends. Uncover different facets of the story, gameplay, and character relationships in each route.

Choose one of three survivors:

Ders Quera - The Mentor          

Ders holds a high leadership position within the village. They're a hard-working mentor to Cirne and Trale. Ders is a heavy-hitting swordfighter! Their special move is a powerful ground pound that can be used to fall quickly and safely or as a devastating attack.

Cirne Glecre - The Delinquent

Cirne is one of many fighters that trains under Ders. Despite their disobedience and spontaneous ways, Cirne manages to weasel into the hearts of their fellow colleagues. Cirne is a fast-paced fighter with two daggers! Their special move is a fast dash to quickly escape and damage enemies.

Trale Lugiben - The Diligent

Trale is another fighter in training and Ders's pupil. They're generally reserved and a little timid but they are respected among their peers for their exceptional skills. Trale is a ranged character that fights with a bow! They can shoot arrows rapidly or fire a charge shot. Their special move is a defensive bubble that pushes away enemies and deflects projectiles.

Features:

  • Three unique playable characters

  • Six unique boss battles with their own variations

  • Multiple routes and endings

  • An overarching story about survival and community

  • Surreal imagery inspired by RPG Maker horror games

  • Original soundtrack by Lex Feathers

  • And more...

Revertices is currently mid-development.
